author: Mario Reder <mreder1289@gmail.com>
name: smmdb
description: A utility library for Super Mario Maker and Super Mario Maker 2 to read and manipulate game files.

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:web && yarn build:node && yarn cp
scripts.watch: RUSTFLAGS='-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory' cargo watch -w src -i src/proto -s 'wasm-pack build --dev --target=no-modules --out-name=smmdb -- -Zbuild-std=std,panic_abort'
